title: One last Helvetica question.
content:
So I was reading some backlogs of the posts and came across the Helvetica & the "new media designers" thread.   
   
Is, has, or will there ever be the true italic of Helvetica? I fear waking the sleeping dogs on this one, but I understand what I do. Forgive me father.
author: tayojimenez
